description:
Lina vows to stop the chaos that is thinning the ranks of the Golden Dragons, and the crew heads for Valgaav`s lair. They better hurry - Xellos has plans for the Dark Star!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ist die Welt noch zu retten?
Mondou Muyou! Kessen no Chi o Mezase!
No Time for Arguing! Head for the Showdown!
Pas de discussion ! Vers le lieu du combat décisif !
問答無用! 決戦の地を目指せ!
